meanings.def: the act of getting rid of something
examples: The council is responsible for waste disposal and street cleaning.
the problems of the ultimate disposal of nuclear waste
The device was defused by army bomb disposal experts.
The waste must be taken to an approved disposal facility.

meanings.def: the sale of part of a business, property, etc.
examples: The next step is to think about disposal of your assets.

meanings.def: a machine connected to the waste pipe of a kitchen sink, for cutting food waste into small pieces
available for use as you prefer/somebody prefers
examples: He will have a car at his disposal for the whole month.
Well, I'm at your disposal (= I am ready to help you in any way I can).

idioms.def: available for use as you prefer/somebody prefers
examples: He will have a car at his disposal for the whole month.
Well, I'm at your disposal (= I am ready to help you in any way I can).
